com.o3dr.services.android.lib.util.googleApi

Class GoogleApiClientManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.o3dr.services.android.lib.util.googleApi.GoogleApiClientManager

  • public class GoogleApiClientManager
extends Object
    Handles the lifecycle for the google api client. Also takes care of running submitted tasks when the google api client is connected.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  GoogleApiClientManager.GoogleApiClientTask
      Type for the google api client tasks.
      static interface  GoogleApiClientManager.ManagerListener

    • Method Detail

      • setManagerListener

        public void setManagerListener(GoogleApiClientManager.ManagerListener listener)

      • addTask

        public boolean addTask(GoogleApiClientManager.GoogleApiClientTask task)
        Adds a task to the google api client manager tasks queue. This task will be scheduled to run on the calling thread.
        Parameters:
        task - task making use of the google api client.
        Returns:
        true if the task was successfully added to the queue.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - is the start() method was not called.

      • addTaskToBackground

        public boolean addTaskToBackground(GoogleApiClientManager.GoogleApiClientTask task)
        Adds a task to the google api client manager tasks queue. This task will be scheduled to run on a background thread.
        Parameters:
        task - task making use of the google api client.
        Returns:
        true if the task was successfully added to the queue.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - is the start() method was not called.

      • start

        public void start()
        Activates the google api client manager.
